name: Toggle

jtbd.functional: Provide a binary on/off control that immediately applies a setting change without requiring a separate submit action.
jtbd.affordance: Recognizable switch metaphor — track + sliding thumb communicates two discrete states. Users immediately understand this is a toggle, not a checkbox.
jtbd.emotional: Gives users a sense of direct control. The animated thumb slide confirms the action was registered and the state changed.

anatomy.container: .t-toggle — Outer label element acting as the interactive wrapper; positions input, track, and label in a row
anatomy.input: .t-toggle__input — Visually hidden native checkbox; carries all ARIA state (checked, disabled) and keyboard behavior
anatomy.track: .t-toggle__track — Pill-shaped background that changes color between off (neutral) and on (brand) states
anatomy.thumb: .t-toggle__thumb — Circular indicator that slides within the track to signal current state
anatomy.label: .t-toggle__label — Optional visible text label; can appear before or after the track

variants.default: Track + thumb only, no visible label. Use when context makes the purpose clear.
variants.label-trailing: Label appears to the right of the track (default label position). Use for most form contexts.
variants.label-leading: Label appears to the left of the track. Use when label-first reading order is required.
variants.disabled: Non-interactive state. Track and thumb at 50% opacity, cursor not-allowed.

accessibility.ariaChecked: true (on) or false (off) — must be set by JS or via native checkbox checked state
accessibility.keyboard: Space to toggle; Tab to focus; native checkbox handles all keyboard interaction
accessibility.screenReader: Label text announced with switch role and checked state. Ensure visible label or aria-label is always present.
accessibility.motionReduced: Thumb slide transition and track color transition should be disabled under prefers-reduced-motion: reduce

knownIssues: Two primitive token refs in CSS: --t-raw-neutral-300 (track off-state) and --t-raw-neutral-0 (thumb fill) — must be replaced with semantic tokens before Nursery exit
No size variants (sm/lg) — only one size currently implemented
No indeterminate/loading state for async toggle operations
prefers-reduced-motion not yet applied to thumb slide or track color transitions
ARIA role=switch requires JS or native checkbox — CSS cannot enforce this
futureConsiderations: Size variants: sm (36×20px) and lg (52×28px) to match button size scale
Icon inside thumb (e.g. check/x) for additional state clarity
Toggle group / fieldset pattern for mutually exclusive settings
Loading/pending state for async operations (spinner in thumb)
Color variants beyond brand (e.g. success-colored track for 'enabled' states)
